projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.subtitle: A selection of projects that showcase my skills and experience

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce Platform
ecommerce.desc: A full-featured e-commerce platform with real-time inventory, payment processing, and admin dashboard.
ecommerce.problem: The client needed a scalable e-commerce solution that could handle 10,000+ concurrent users with real-time inventory updates.
ecommerce.solution: Built a microservices architecture with React frontend, Node.js backend, Redis caching, and PostgreSQL database. Implemented WebSocket for live inventory.
ecommerce.result: Achieved 99.9% uptime, 200ms average response time, and 40% increase in conversion rate.

analytics.title: Analytics Dashboard
analytics.desc: Real-time data visualization dashboard with custom charts, filtering, and export capabilities.
analytics.problem: Marketing team needed a way to visualize complex data from multiple sources in real-time.
analytics.solution: Created interactive dashboards using Vue.js, D3.js for custom visualizations, and GraphQL for efficient data fetching.
analytics.result: Reduced report generation time from 2 hours to 5 minutes, serving 500+ daily active users.

mobileApp.title: Fitness Tracking App
mobileApp.desc: Cross-platform mobile app for fitness tracking with social features and AI-powered recommendations.
mobileApp.problem: Users wanted a unified platform to track workouts, nutrition, and connect with fitness communities.
mobileApp.solution: Developed a React Native app with Firebase backend, implementing AI recommendations using TensorFlow.js.
mobileApp.result: 50,000+ downloads in first month, 4.8 star rating on app stores.
